result.reason: mRemoteNG hosts remote protocol sessions (RDP, VNC, SSH) that consume keyboard input directly, making global keyboard window-move shortcuts impractical and likely to conflict with remote session keybindings; window management is delegated to the OS (Alt+Space, Win+arrows).
result.approach: Decline — keyboard shortcuts for moving the host application window would conflict with remote session input capture; users should use OS-native shortcuts (Alt+Space → Move, Win+arrows)
